page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5ws_LogoutUser([* Localsession [,* Localrequest [,* Localresponse ]]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = The user was logged out. .F. = The user was not logged out.

page.description: Log out the current user and remove the remember me cookie. This can only be used on a web page.
page.discussion: Removes all login information for the current user from the session. The A5WS_LogoutUser() function removes all login information for the current logged in user Limitations: May be used on A5W pages in web applications only.

see.ref: Removes all login information for the current user from the session
